name: Pinball wizard Apple Arcade
description:
The Pinball Wizard is an arcade adventure game where the main character is propelled into action by a set of flippers, like the ball in a pinball machine. Each level of the game is a contained area inside a tower. The goal of the game is to survive and get to the top of the tower.

The Pinball Wizard includes:

Tower Mode: Climb a tower with twenty-one levels and defeat the big, bad, boss.

Dungeon Mode: Survive as long as you can in a giant dungeon.

Daily Dungeon: A randomized new dungeon, everyday!

Upgrade Skills: Unlock and maximize all 16 skills including Dash and Magic Orb.

Play Offline: The Pinball Wizard can be played entirely without an internet connection.
